segments.text: I notice the water spilling all over the floor, and the woman just doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she keeps polishing that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so reckless, climbing on that stool to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and it’s going to be a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, encouraging him, not thinking about the consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is ruining the cabinets, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s complete lack of awareness is frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so neat, but inside it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to step in before this gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
